channel.title: xylem | Gordon Beeming
channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: Webinar - Performance Tuning .NET & SQL Code using ANTS Profiler
item.description: Friend of Red Gate (and .NET MVP) Mitchel Sellers will be hosting it for us alongside Red Gate's APP product manager Ben Emmett. We're running it in conjunction with LinkedIn group LIDNUG (LinkedIn .NET User Group) who have over 52,000 members so we're hoping to get a big list of people signed up! Feel free to sign up yourself or let anyone know who you think might be interested in registering.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Know it. Prove it. 28 days to rock your skills.
item.description: If you haven't heard yet Microsoft Virtual Academy are running "know it. Prove it". This is a great opportunity to learn something new or extend your current knowledge in one of the 8 topics available.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
